item.title: Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket expansion ‘Crimson Blaze’ launches December 17
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

Featuring Mega Charizard Y, Mega Venusaur, Mega Blastoise, and more.

Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket expansion “Crimson Blaze” will launch on December 17, The Pokemon Company announced.

The description reads: “In ‘Crimson Blaze,’ Mega-Evolved Pokemon led by Mega Charizard Y—such as Mega Venusaur and Mega Blastoise—will be appearing for the first time. We hope you enjoy an even broader Pokemon Trading Card Game collecting experience with the new booster packs featuring many research lab themed illustrations.”

Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket is available now for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play.

Watch a trailer for the expansion below.

Expansion “Crimson Blaze” Announce Trailer
